mapper.select: SELECT sabun, name, reg_no, hp, (SELECT name FROM PUB WHERE gubun='AA' AND PUB.code=INSA.pos_gbn_code) AS pos_gbn_code, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS join_day, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS retire_day, (SELECT name FROM PUB WHERE gubun='FF' AND PUB.code=INSA.put_yn)put_yn, salary FROM INSA ORDER BY sabun
SELECT gubun, code, name, note FROM PUB

SELECT sabun, name, reg_no, hp, (SELECT P.gubun FROM PUB p, INSA i WHERE gubun='AA' AND p.code=i.pos_gbn_code) pos_gbn_code, TO_CHAR(join_day, 'yyyy-mm-dd')join_day, TO_CHAR(retire_day, 'yyyy-mm-dd')retire_day, put_yn, salary FROM INSA WHERE sabun=#{sabun}
